channel.title: Task 3: Message Class :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: Up to this point, you have got a copy of the starter code and taken an initial dive into how the Command class works. Now letâ€™s turn our focus to the Message class! Message Recall, the role of a message object is to bundle commands to send to the rover. Remember with TDD, first read through the description of the class. Then read through the given tests and think about what each test means for the desired behavior of the class. Only then should you start coding the Message class.
